message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $120. Considering its quality and benefits, I would like to extend this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $110. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find it attractive. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the discount, but $110 is still a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your offer, I am willing to consider a price of $105 for the product. I believe this strikes a fair balance between our interests. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
